A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite some action sequences from the Rebels\, and great visual effects\, the story lacks on making characters interesting\, poor story arcs from \"important characters\" like Snoke and Phasma\, classy gags from luke and the unnecessary use of force from Leia\, which adds nothing to the movie. Diminishes what could be a great story\, but these easy to kill characters and poor story arcs from most of the cast doesn´t make justice to a Star Wars film. Sure it´s a most see film but don´t expect much from characters that got a lot of publicity only to be a total flaw on the film
